profile.contactUsDescription: If you have questions or encounter problems, please feel free to contact our support by email
profile.companiesAndStudentAssociationsDescripti: Would you like your company or student association to be visible in our application? We would be happy to discuss partnership opportunities. Please contact us at the email address below.

install.install_ticketless_description: Install this app on your device to get the best experience. For example, it enables push notifications.
